summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Westlake Project; providing for necessary costs incurred in project planning and administration, further real estate appraisals, and tenant relocation; authorizing the execution of earnest money agreements for acquisition of property in Blocks 1 and 8, heirs of Sarah A. Bell's Addition to Seattle, and Block 19, A.A. Denny's 3rd Addition to Seattle; creating certain positions in the Department of Community Development; making a conditionally reimbursable appropriation from the Emergency Fund and declaring the Emergency therefor.
committee: Special Committee on the Westlake Project
